title: Walking up a Hill

children.value:
A person of mass 
$\quantity{80}{kg}$
 walks for 
$\quantity{102}{m}$
 along a path going up a hill of uniform gradient 1 in 5.
Calculate the work done against gravity by this person.

answer.value: This energy is transformed into gravitational potential energy.

hints.value:
A gradient of 1 in 5 means that for every 
$\quantity{5}{m}$
 horizontally, 
$\quantity{1}{m}$
 is gained in vertical height. It is also called a slope of 
$\quantity{20}{#37; }$
.
